thread.section_title: Hotel 2000 Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pros and cons.
thread.title_full: Pros and cons. - Review of Hotel 2000 Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: mandylou1981
title: Pros and cons.
text:
Pros
Excellent location to barberini metro, Spanish steps, trevi fountain colleseum all in walking distance.
Owner is a cute charming old man
Building is prestigious and gives a luxury image.
Cheap price
Cons
Air con apparently is not used until April, which means in march when you are sleeping it's too hot in the room and worse when a female has to use hairdryer!
Towels old thin smelly and dry.
No complimentary water included.
Bed and pillows are so uncomfortable, as a result poor sleep which is not ideal with full days of excursions.
